summary: This bill, the Protecting American Students Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain students from the calculation used to determine if private colleges and universities are subject to the excise tax on net investment income. The bill specifies that students must meet eligibility requirements under the Higher Education Act of 1965 to be excluded. It also mandates that applicable educational institutions report the number of students used in the calculation, both before and after the exclusion, on their tax returns. The changes apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
